[00:00.00]Fast (Explicit) - Juice WRLD
[00:03.39]Lyrics by：Jarad Higgins/Andrew Wotman/Louis Bell/Adam Feeney/Carl Rosen
[00:06.79]Composed by：Jarad Higgins/Andrew Wotman/Louis Bell/Adam Feeney/Carl Rosen
[00:10.19]Time is want
[00:12.12]I been living fast fast fast fast
[00:15.00]Feeling really bad bad bad bad
[00:17.53]Time really moves fast fast fast fast
[00:20.27]But hurry up and get in your bag bag bag bag
[00:22.95]I wear Dior not a fad 'ad 'ad 'ad
[00:25.67]I know all these n***as gettin' mad mad mad mad
[00:28.47]My hand on my trigger I'ma die with respect yeah
[00:31.32]F**king with my money you'll get dealt like that yeah
[00:34.28]I took too many pills count up the bills uh
[00:37.60]Molly in my cup I can't tell you how I feel uh
[00:40.59]Oh last call
[00:43.03]Oh-oh that's gnarly
[00:45.78]Every day I be counting up counting up the blues
[00:48.60]Gotta win sometimes when you always lose
[00:51.38]I get high as a b***h still the same dude
[00:54.24]I was back then and now I'm lost and confused
[00:57.44]I ain't see it coming
[01:00.04]I ain't see it coming
[01:03.00]But it still came

[01:36.75]But it's okay 'cause I'm rich
[01:38.90]Psych I'm still sad as a b***h right
[01:42.60]I don't want nobody to think that I'm an asshole
[01:45.48]I don't try to be mean on purpose I promise
[01:48.12]My mama taught me better than that I'll be honest
[01:50.85]I blame it on the drugs and this life I'm involved in
[01:53.96]I ain't see it coming I ain't see it
[01:56.90]I ain't see it coming I ain't see it
[01:59.55]But it still came yeah yeah it still came
[02:01.81]I'm talkin' 'bout life ayy Talkin' 'bout life

[02:10.42]Time really moves fast fast fast fast

[02:35.44]What happens next Story to be continued yeah

data.trans:
[ti:Fast (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:Death Race For Love (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.39]//
[00:06.79]//
[00:10.19]想要的就是时间
[00:12.12]我一直过着快节奏的生活
[00:15.00]这种感觉很不好
[00:17.53]时间过得真快
[00:20.27]抓紧时间 多赚点钱进腰包
[00:22.95]我穿迪奥 不是因为一时的狂热
[00:25.67]我知道很多人都眼红我
[00:28.47]我随时准备开枪 就算死了也能赢得世人的尊敬
[00:31.32]要是敢碰我的钱 让你没有好下场
[00:34.28]我吃了很多药 还在数钱
[00:37.60]杯子里放了** 此刻的感觉无法形容
[00:40.59]最后一杯了
[00:43.03]真是爽翻了
[00:45.78]每次都要把我的钱数一遍
[00:48.60]有失必有得
[00:51.38]我简直嗨得不行了 身边还是原来那些人
[00:54.24]我也曾失落过 迷茫过 现在我重新找回了自我
[00:57.44]就算我未曾察觉
[01:00.04]就算我未曾察觉
[01:03.00]该来的还是要来
[01:05.00]我说的是生活

[01:36.75]不过没关系 反正我很有钱
[01:38.90]事实上 做了心理治疗 我还是很郁闷
[01:42.60]我不想让别人觉得我是个不孝子
[01:45.48]我也不是故意对他们不好 我发誓
[01:48.12]我的妈妈从小教我好好做人 我会做个诚实的人
[01:50.85]都怪** 让我的生活变成了这样
